---

An inline citation looks like @Reades:2025. 

An inline citation with details looks like @Reades:2025 [Ch.4].

A parenthetical citation looks like [@Reades:2025] or [@Reades:2025, Ch.4].


Multiple inline citations looks like @Reades:2025 and @Reades:2023. 

Multiple inline citations with details looks like @Reades:2025 and @Reades:2023 [Ch.4].

Multiple  parenthetical citations looks like [@Reades:2023; @Reades:2025, Ch.4].
